TopicTitle: EVE/sci fi vis enhancement/ Scatterer sunand planet bug

Articles.Content: I am having some visual bugs with E>V<E and/or scatterer and/or sci fi visual enhancements. So basically there is a weird ring around the sun and i also have distant object enhancement and was looking at jool and saw that it too had the bug. I have included some screenshots so you can see what is happening.  If you know what is causing this or how to fix it please leave a reply
